discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
Agree with B other answers makes no sense especially A and D

Selected Answer: B
Dedicating separate warehouses to load and query operations:

Loading large data sets can affect query performance. We recommend dedicating separate warehouses for loading and querying operations to optimize performance for each.

questions.question_text: What does Snowflake recommend when planning virtual warehouse usage for a data load?

choices.A: Load the fewest possible number of large files.
choices.B: Dedicate a separate warehouse for loading data.
choices.C: Increase the size of the warehouse used.

questions.question_text: Which Snowflake database object can be used to track data changes made to table data?
Who can activate and enforce a network policy for all users in a Snowflake account? (Choose two.)

discussion.content: Only security administrators (i.e. users with the SECURITYADMIN role) or higher or a role with the global ATTACH POLICY privilege can activate a network policy for an account.

comments.content:
Agree with your answer B+C , but the link should be 
https://docs.snowflake.com/en/user-guide/network-policies
Activating a network policy for an account enforces the policy for all users in the account.

Only security administrators (i.e. users with the SECURITYADMIN role) or higher or a role with the global ATTACH POLICY privilege can activate a network policy for an account.

choices.D: A role that has the NETWORK_POLICY account parameter set
choices.A: A user with an USERADMIN or higher role
choices.C: A role that has been granted the ATTACH POLICY privilege
choices.B: A user with a SECURITYADMIN or higher role
choices.E: A role that has the OWNERSHIP of the network policy

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: CE
CE - marketplace and direct share

A data provider can share data in Snowflake using one of the following options:

1. A Listing, in which you offer a share and additional metadata as a data product to one or more accounts,

2. Direct Share, in which you directly share specific database objects (a share) to another account in your region,

3. Data Exchange, in which you set up and manage a group of accounts and offer a share to that group.
A listing is nothing but Snowflake MarketPlace

questions.question_text: How can a data provider share their Snowflake data? (Choose two.)
